attributes.description:
: Established in 2003 gives us the ability to offer bank approved finance on a wide variety of available vehicles to suit your budget and preference.
: A 2 year extended warranty is available on finance and cash transactions.
: All vehicles are inspected and serviced by our RMI approved workshop prior to display on the showroom floor.
: Nationwide delivery can be arranged
: Excludes “delivery fee”, license and registration
Terms and conditions apply. RECONDITIONING COSTS TO BE ADDED TO PRICE OF VEHICLE.

Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. Definitely A Must See, Please Call/WhatsApp DE RM MOTORS To View All Vehicle, 1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometre vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 2. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
